p: The lateral bud of plant material was used in this study. For surface sterilization procedures, the explants were soaked in filtered distilled water followed by 95% ethanol for 5 min. Thereafter, the explants were soaked in 25% of sodium hypochlorite solution added with 2â€“3 drops of tween 20 (Sigma, St. Louis, MO, USA) for 20 min. The explants were then thoroughly rinsed with sterile distilled water to remove any traces of remaining detergents [ 76].
